commands.name: az sql mi partner-cert create
commands.summary: Upload a server trust certificate from box to Sql Managed Instance.
commands.syntax:
az sql mi partner-cert create --certificate-name
                              --instance-name
                              --resource-group
                              [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                              [--public-blob]

commands.name: az sql mi partner-cert delete
commands.summary: Delete a server trust certificate that was uploaded from box to Sql Managed Instance.
commands.syntax:
az sql mi partner-cert delete [--certificate-name]
                              [--ids]
                              [--instance-name]
                              [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                              [--resource-group]
                              [--subscription]
                              [--yes]

commands.name: az sql mi partner-cert list
commands.summary: Get a list of server trust certificates that were uploaded from box to the given Sql Managed Instance.

commands.name: az sql mi partner-cert show
commands.summary: Get a server trust certificate that was uploaded from box to Sql Managed Instance.
